price: (ئەم خۆزگە) ھیچ سوودێکتان پێناگەیەنێت چونکە ستەمتان کرد بێگومان ئێوە لە سزای سەختدا ھاوبەشن
arabic: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِذ ظَّلَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِكُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walan yanfaʿakumu al-yawma idh ẓalamtum annakum fī al-ʿadhābi mush'tarikūna
